verses.verse: שַׁאֲל֨וּ <WH7592> sha-'a-Lu Ask מֵיְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh ye of the LORD מָטָר֙ <WH4306> ma-Tar rain בְּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> be-'Et in the time מַלְק֔וֹשׁ <WH4456> mal-Koosh, of the latter rain יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [so] the LORD עֹשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh shall make חֲזִיזִ֑ים <WH2385> cha-zi-Zim; bright clouds וּמְטַר־ <WH4306> u-me-tar- of rain גֶּ֙שֶׁם֙ <WH1653> ge-shem them showers יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> yit-Ten and give לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> la-Hem, like לְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> le-'Ish to every one עֵ֥שֶׂב <WH6212> 'E-sev grass בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> bas-sa-Deh. in the field

כִּ֧י <WH3588> ki because הַתְּרָפִ֣ים <WH8655> hat-te-ra-Fim For the idols דִּבְּרוּ־ <WH1696> dib-be-ru- have spoken אָ֗וֶן <WH205> 'A-ven, vanity וְהַקּֽוֹסְמִים֙ <WH7080> ve-hak-kos-Mim and the diviners חָ֣זוּ <WH2372> Cha-zu have seen שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> She-ker, a lie וַֽחֲלֹמוֹת֙ <WH2472> va-cha-lo-mOt dreams הַשָּׁ֣וא <WH7723> hash-Sha-v false. יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <WH1696> ye-dab-Be-ru, and have told הֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> He-vel in vain יְנַֽחֵמ֑וּן <WH5162> ye-na-che-Mun; they comfort עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> ken after that נָסְע֣וּ <WH5265> na-se-'U therefore they went כְמוֹ־ <WH3644> che-mov- like צֹ֔אן <WH6629> Tzon, their way as a flock יַעֲנ֖וּ <WH6031> ya-'a-Nu they were troubled כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- because אֵ֥ין <WH369> 'ein there רֹעֶֽה׃ <WH7462> ro-'Eh. because [there was] no shepherd פ Peh

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against הָֽרֹעִים֙ <WH7462> ha-ro-'Im against the shepherds חָרָ֣ה <WH2734> cha-Rah was kindled אַפִּ֔י <WH639> 'ap-Pi, Mine anger וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- against הָעַתּוּדִ֖ים <WH6260> ha-'at-tu-Dim the goats אֶפְק֑וֹד <WH6485> ef-Kod; and I punished כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for פָקַד֩ <WH6485> fa-Kad hath visited יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> Yah-weh for the LORD צְבָא֤וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot of hosts אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֶדְרוֹ֙ <WH5739> ed-Ro his flock אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְשָׂ֣ם <WH7760> ve-Sam and hath made אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> o-Tam, כְּס֥וּס <WH5483> ke-Sus horse הוֹד֖וֹ <WH1935> ho-Do them as his goodly בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> bam-mil-cha-Mah. in the battle

מִמֶּ֤נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu at פִנָּה֙ <WH6438> fin-Nah the corner מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu them יָתֵ֔ד <WH3489> ya-Ted, out of him the nail מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu them קֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7198> Ke-shet bow מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> mil-cha-Mah; out of him the battle מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu them יֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> ye-Tze Out of him came forth כָל־ <WH3605> chol every נוֹגֵ֖שׂ <WH5065> no-Ges out of him every oppressor יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> yach-Dav. together

וְהָי֨וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu will be as כְגִבֹּרִ֜ים <WH1368> che-gib-bo-Rim And they shall be as mighty בּוֹסִ֨ים <WH947> bo-Sim [men] which tread down בְּטִ֤יט <WH2916> be-Tit [their enemies] in the mire חוּצוֹת֙ <WH2351> chu-tzOt of the streets בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> bam-mil-cha-Mah, in the battle וְנִ֨לְחֲמ֔וּ <WH3898> ve-Nil-cha-Mu, and they shall fight כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh because the LORD עִמָּ֑ם <WH5973> 'im-Mam; with וְהֹבִ֖ישׁוּ <WH3001> ve-ho-Vi-shu shall be confounded רֹכְבֵ֥י <WH7392> ro-che-Vei [is] with them and the riders סוּסִֽים׃ <WH5483> su-Sim. on horses

וְגִבַּרְתִּ֣י׀ <WH1396> ve-gib-bar-Ti And I will strengthen אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit the house יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> beit the house יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> yo-Sef of Joseph אוֹשִׁ֔יעַ <WH3467> o-Shi-a', and I will save וְהֽוֹשְׁבוֹתִים֙ <WH7725> ve-ho-she-vo-Tim will bring כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki Because רִֽחַמְתִּ֔ים <WH7355> ri-cham-Tim, them for I have mercy וְהָי֖וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu shall be as כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher upon them and they shall be as though לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- had not זְנַחְתִּ֑ים <WH2186> ze-nach-Tim; I had not cast them off כִּ֗י <WH3588> Ki, Because אֲנִ֛י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh for I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem their God וְאֶעֱנֵֽם׃ <WH6030> ve-'e-'e-Nem. and will hear

וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu will be like כְגִבּוֹר֙ <WH1368> che-gib-bOr shall be like a mighty אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim, And [they of] Ephraim וְשָׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> ve-sa-Mach shall rejoice לִבָּ֖ם <WH3820> lib-Bam [man] and their heart כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> ke-mov- if יָ֑יִן <WH3196> Ya-yin; as through wine וּבְנֵיהֶם֙ <WH1121> u-ve-nei-Hem yea their children יִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> yir-'U shall see וְשָׂמֵ֔חוּ <WH8056> ve-sa-Me-chu, glad יָגֵ֥ל <WH1523> ya-Gel shall rejoice לִבָּ֖ם <WH3820> lib-Bam their heart בַּיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. in the LORD

אֶשְׁרְקָ֥ה <WH8319> 'esh-re-Kah I will hiss לָהֶ֛ם la-Hem וַאֲקַבְּצֵ֖ם <WH6908> va-'a-kab-be-Tzem for them and gather כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for פְדִיתִ֑ים <WH6299> fe-di-Tim; them for I have redeemed וְרָב֖וּ <WH7235> ve-ra-Vu them and they shall increase כְּמ֥וֹ <WH3644> ke-Mo will be as רָבֽוּ׃ <WH7235> ra-Vu. as they have increased

וְאֶזְרָעֵם֙ <WH2232> ve-'ez-ra-'Em And I will sow בָּֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> ba-'am-Mim, them among the people וּבַמֶּרְחַקִּ֖ים <WH4801> u-vam-mer-chak-Kim me in far countries יִזְכְּר֑וּנִי <WH2142> yiz-ke-Ru-ni; and they shall remember וְחָי֥וּ <WH2421> ve-cha-Yu and they shall live אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> be-nei-Hem with their children וָשָֽׁבוּ׃ <WH7725> va-Sha-vu. and turn again

וַהֲשִֽׁיבוֹתִים֙ <WH7725> va-ha-shi-vo-Tim I will bring them again מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz also out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt וּמֵֽאַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> u-me-'ash-Shur them out of Assyria אֲקַבְּצֵ֑ם <WH6908> 'a-kab-be-Tzem; and gather וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- into אֶ֨רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz them into the land גִּלְעָ֤ד <WH1568> gil-'Ad of Gilead וּלְבָנוֹן֙ <WH3844> u-le-va-nOn and Lebanon אֲבִיאֵ֔ם <WH935> 'a-vi-'Em, and I will bring וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo no יִמָּצֵ֖א <WH4672> yim-ma-Tze and [place] shall not be found לָהֶֽם׃ <WH99999> la-Hem.

וְעָבַ֨ר <WH5674> ve-'a-Var And he shall pass through בַּיָּ֜ם <WH3220> bai-Yam the sea צָרָ֗ה <WH6869> tza-Rah, with affliction וְהִכָּ֤ה <WH5221> ve-hik-Kah and shall smite בַיָּם֙ <WH3220> vai-Yam in the sea גַּלִּ֔ים <WH1530> gal-Lim, the waves וְהֹבִ֕ישׁוּ <WH3001> ve-ho-Vi-shu shall dry up כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol all מְצוּל֣וֹת <WH4688> me-tzu-Lot and all the deeps יְאֹ֑ר <WH2975> ye-'Or; of the river וְהוּרַד֙ <WH3381> ve-hu-Rad shall be brought down גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> ge-'on and the pride אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> 'ash-Shur, of Assyria וְשֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> ve-She-vet and the sceptre מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt יָסֽוּר׃ <WH5493> ya-Sur. shall depart away

וְגִבַּרְתִּים֙ <WH1396> ve-gib-bar-Tim And I will strengthen בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, them in the LORD וּבִשְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> u-vish-Mo in his name יִתְהַלָּ֑כוּ <WH1980> yit-hal-La-chu; and they shall walk up and down נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek
